title: SHOW 103 - Keir Starmer (LIVE)
itunes:title: SHOW 103 - Keir Starmer (LIVE)
itunes:subtitle: Keir Starmer is the Shadow Secretary of State for…
description:
Keir Starmer is the Shadow Secretary of State for Exiting the European Union and to many people, the real Leader of the Opposition. In this honest and sometimes hilarious interview, Keir takes us behind the scenes of the cross party Brexit talks, shadow cabinet meetings and his own discussions with Michel Barnier. He also reveals his frustrations with Brexit, his own party and British politics in general. Follow Keir on Twitter: @Keir_Starmer Follow Matt on Twitter: @mattforde Get tickets to Matt’s brand new Edinburgh show ‘Brexit Pursued by a Bear’ here: https://tickets.edfringe.com/whats-on/matt-forde-brexit-pursued-by-a-bear

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
